actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Rural Development, Electrification.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Rural Development and Rural Electrification

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to establish and maintain a central receiving facility at the Department of Agriculture for the storage and retrieval of data relating to Federal rural development programs, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rural Development Data Base Act of 1989

summary.text: Rural Development Data Base Act of 1989 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) develop and make available to the public within the Department of Agriculture a Federal rural development programs data base; and (2) submit a report to the appropriate congressional committees. Authorizes the Secretary to appoint a related advisory panel.

titles.title: Rural Development Data Base Act of 1989

A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to establish and maintain a central receiving facility at the Department of Agriculture for the storage and retrieval of data relating to Federal rural development programs, and for other purposes.
